title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Thailand 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, gradually decreasing from 2018 to 2019, and lastly roughly constant from 2019 to 2020.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 4.13 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.87 was reached at Year 2019
min_summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, gradually decreasing from 2018 to 2019, and lastly roughly constant from 2019 to 2020.
